revised_title: Improving High-Temperature Oxidation Resistance in Metals with Reactive Elements and Oxide Dispersions
tldr: This article explores the improvements in high-temperature oxidation resistance in metals by adding reactive elements or oxide dispersions. The authors discuss the effects of various additives, such as yttrium, hafnium, and lanthanum, on the oxidation behavior of different alloys. They also examine the role of oxide dispersions in strengthening materials and reducing the growth rate of oxide scales.
